title: ‘Americans need to stand together’: Hillary Clinton’s remarks following the Orlando shooting
text: By Washington Post Staff Hillary Clinton delivered an address pledging that as president she would take on "lone wolves" who might carry out terrorist attacks in the United States and calling for unity in light of the massacre at a gay nightclub in Orlando on Sunday.
